author: sebb
msg: More closely simulate run-time by setting up XPath in separate test

author: arminw
msg: remove redundant object handling to fix deadlock problem with SQLServer

author: fhanik
msg: Fixed so that the pause is not calculated in the send time

author: danielf
msg: Some hacks to not create an sitemap internal bean factory when there is no component configuration in the sitemap. This makes the tree processor work when there is no internal component configurations in the old ECM context. This in turn means that most of the test cases for the blocks fw works again and that we can continue the work on block deployment.
